name: QuantumGiz
description: A Tech Eshop focused on delivering a seamless, mobile-friendly user experience, showcasing skills in modern web development.

infoCards.title: Optimized for All Screen Sizes
infoCards.description: QuantumGiz is designed with a mobile-first approach, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices. The layout adapts effortlessly to smartphones, tablets, and desktops, providing an engaging interface regardless of screen size.

infoCards.title: Dynamic Shopping Cart & Gallery
infoCards.description: Built an intuitive shopping cart that allows real-time updates and a user-friendly product gallery. Users can easily browse items, apply filters, and track their selections in a streamlined manner, demonstrating a functional online shopping experience without actual payments.
infoCards.alt: intuitive shopping cart that allows real-time updates and a user-friendly product gallery

infoCards.title: Wild Card Product Display & Recommendations
infoCards.description: Implemented a wild card feature for showcasing products, enabling a clean and organized layout that highlights various items. This card also includes recommendation sliders that suggest similar products, enhancing user engagement by presenting tailored options based on browsing behavior.
infoCards.alt: Implemented a wild card feature for showcasing products

nextSteps.title: Implement Smart Search Navigation
nextSteps.description: Add a search bar that filters products by name, category, and tags in real-time. Ensure the search results are user-friendly and visually appealing.

nextSteps.title: Create a Wishlist/Favorites List
nextSteps.description: Allow users to save their favorite products without creating an account. Utilize local storage to save data temporarily and clear it after a set period.

actionCard.title: Ready to Experience QuantumGiz?
actionCard.subtitle: Join us on this exciting journey of seamless shopping.

name: NexusChat
description: A decentralized web application that blends AI-powered assistance with user-owned data, offering intelligent chat, note-taking, and storage capabilities — all backed by blockchain privacy and security.

infoCards.title: AI Chat Across Any Topic
infoCards.description: From writing code to answering life’s questions, NexusChat uses powerful AI models like ChatGPT to help you learn, create, and solve problems in real-time — with zero data compromise.

infoCards.title: User-Owned Data on the Blockchain
infoCards.description: Every message, note, or folder is securely encrypted and stored as a Sui blockchain object — fully owned and managed by you, not by us.

infoCards.title: No Accounts, Just Your Wallet
infoCards.description: Log in with your Sui-compatible wallet. No usernames, no passwords, no centralized databases — only cryptographic access and session-based control.

nextSteps.title: Hybrid Storage: Cloud & Blockchain
nextSteps.description: Implement a hybrid data system where encrypted content is stored off-chain on a decentralized cloud (e.g. IPFS), while proofs and metadata remain on-chain. This balances cost, scalability, and decentralization without sacrificing ownership.

nextSteps.title: User-Selectable AI Models
nextSteps.description: Expand AI flexibility by allowing users to choose from multiple integrated AI providers — including OpenAI (GPT), Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, or open-source alternatives — based on performance, privacy, or cost preferences. Users can select their preferred model in a settings panel before starting each chat.

bannerSection.title: Where AI Meets Data Sovereignty
bannerSection.subtitle: NexusChat is more than a chatbot — it’s a decentralized space for learning, thinking, and storing knowledge. Every message and note is encrypted, owned by you, and stored on-chain — with your wallet as the key.
bannerSection.ImageAlt: Data Security with a man and a lock
